name: u can run
description:
You play a haunted bluebird who must fly for its dear life.  Simple atari-style thing with a single straightforward but increasingly challenging mechanic.  Bells and whistles not included.  Direction keys or WASD are all you need to know.  Headphones recommended for binaural fun.  Personal high score is 40 but I think I just got lucky.

Art assets by VEXED: https://v3x3d.itch.io/bit-bonanza

Have fun!
